dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will openly and honestly show their emotions, using facial expressions and verbal cues.
Your FarTwin will keep their emotions to themselves, not revealing their feelings or opinions through body language or tone of voice.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle conflicts?

options.description: Your FarTwin will confront and argue with others, using forceful language and tone to assert their point of view.
Your FarTwin will work with others to find a mutually beneficial solution, listening actively and compromising when necessary.

dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will analyze data and use logic to arrive at a solution, considering multiple perspectives before acting.
Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and gut feelings to guide their decision-making, trusting their intuition over evidence-based reasoning.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach learning?

options.description: Your FarTwin will analyze data and information, breaking it down into component parts to understand its underlying principles.
Your FarTwin will learn through hands-on experiences, experimenting with different approaches to discover their own strengths and weaknesses.

dimensions.label: Time Management Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin manage their time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will set realistic goals and deadlines, expecting to achieve them and working towards success.
Your FarTwin will underestimate their own abilities, setting overly ambitious goals and often falling behind schedule due to excessive caution.

dimensions.label: Social Interaction Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be outgoing and sociable, seeking opportunities to meet new people and engage in group activities.
Your FarTwin will prefer quieter, more low-key environments, taking time to recharge before interacting with others.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach risk?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take calculated risks, seeking new experiences and challenges to test their limits.
Your FarTwin will avoid unnecessary risk, playing it safe and prioritizing stability over potential rewards.
